content: I'm excited to attend the Easter Vigil at St. Joseph's Church this Sunday and celebrate Rachel's baptism. I've been looking forward to this special day for weeks, and I'm honored to be a part of it. I'll make sure to pray for Rachel and the community, and I'll take in the beauty and significance of the rituals and symbols during the service. Afterward, I'll reflect on my own faith journey and think about how I can continue to support Rachel in hers. Thanks for the prayer suggestions and reminders!
